Player History
Drafted in 19th round, 300th overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/16/2015, off Dale Eichorn (PHI)...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 8/15/2015...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2015, hitting .319 with 3 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2016...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/9/2017 to a 3-year deal worth $4,600,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/14/2017 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 6/13/2018...
